description: The file defines a Flutter widget for a Workouts page, including UI components for listing, creating, editing, and deleting workout plans, along with pagination controls.

classes.name: WorkoutsPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the page for managing workout plans, including listing, paging, and opening forms for create/edit.

classes.name: _WorkoutsPageState
classes.description: State class for WorkoutsPage, managing initial load and UI rendering.

classes.name: _PaginationBar
classes.description: A stateless widget displaying pagination controls.

classes.name: _WorkoutFormDialog
classes.description: A dialog widget for creating or editing a workout plan.

classes.name: _WorkoutFormDialogState
classes.description: State class for _WorkoutFormDialog, handling form state and submission.

methods.name: didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Loads workout data once when dependencies change.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the page, including list and pagination.

methods.name: _confirmDelete
methods.description: Shows confirmation dialog and deletes a workout if confirmed.

methods.name: _WorkoutFormDialog.build
methods.description: Builds the form dialog for creating/editing workouts.

methods.name: _WorkoutFormDialogState.initState
methods.description: Initializes the form controllers with existing data if editing.

methods.name: _WorkoutFormDialogState.build
methods.description: Builds the dialog UI with form fields and save/cancel actions.
